forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The dawning hours in Downtown San Francisco find the sky draped in a veil of clouds, hinting at a variable morning before the sun claims its rightful space. A gentle breeze whispers from the southwest, inviting a sense of calm as the air settles around 57 degrees. As the day unfolds, expect the clouds to dissipate, giving way to a generous embrace of sunlight that will warm the city to about 65 degrees. The winds will dance lightly at first, picking up as day breaks, with gusts promising to add a crisp energy to the air. 

Though the morning may feel shrouded in a cool embrace, clear skies beckon a host of activities that speak to the soul of the city. An afternoon stroll along the waterfront offers a perfect blend of gentle warmth and fresh air, ideal for a leisurely exploration of local shops or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the many parks. Dress comfortably with layers—perhaps a light jacket that can easily be shed as you bask in the sun's embrace. This day, though starting quietly, promises to evolve into a delightful blend of sun and breeze, enticing you to savor both the simple pleasures of life and the unique charm of San Francisco.
